text: Kazani is the name for a pit located in the Stari Grad area of Sarajevo. From mid-1992 to the second half of 1993, mostly Serb civilians were killed in Kazani. The bodies were then thrown into the pit. These war crimes were committed by Mušan Topalović Caco and members of the 10th Mountain Brigade of the Army of the Republic of Bosnia and Herzegovina. == References == ==Other websites== * BH Dani Kazani: posljednja priča Category:War crimes Category:1990s in Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Mass murder in 1993 Category:1992 in Europe
title: Kazani pit killings
